thread.title: Former Newcastle star Remy Cabella shares gruesome injury pic
thread.title_full: Former Newcastle star Remy Cabella shares gruesome injury pic

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Former Newcastle star Remy Cabella shares gruesome injury pic
text:
Former Newcastle star Remy Cabella shares gruesome injury pic GRAPHIC CONTENT WARNING: The Marseille midfielder suffered a nasty injury during the 4-1 reverse by Monaco Share Remy Cabella suffered a horror injury after this challenge Djibril Sidibe (Photo: AFP) Share Get daily   
It was a bad day at the office for Marseille star Remy Cabella on Sunday. 
The former Newcastle midfielder suffered a nasty injury after a reckless challenge by Monaco's Djibril Sidibe in the 4-1 reverse against their Ligue 1 title rivals. 
Cabella, who has earlier missed a good chance to level, needed seven stitches in a bid patch up the gash on his right shin and took to Snapchat to vent his fury that his opponent escaped without punishment. 
He shared a picture of the injury, along with the caption: “7 stitches and not even fault.” 
Marseille were already trailing by three goals by the time Cabella was forced out of the action just before the hour mark. 
The reverse left Marseille 15 points off the pace, with Monaco leapfrogging Nice into top spot. 
Cabella, 26, has scored once in 14 games since returning to the Stade Velodrome on a permanent basis in the summer. Like us on Facebook
